name: Envy (HedgeHog)
description:
The story follows Kate, who has to struggle between her work and personal life. It's a psychological horror game about deep fears and anxieties of the professional painter. 
The game is short, playtime 10-15 minutes.
It features dark themes and the ending is simple enough.
This project was made only by me, everything you see in the game is original.
Thanks for playing and have an amazing experience.  
Movements - Basic WASD keys.
Interaction - Press E on the keyboard.
